summary: Created comprehensive Graphiti knowledge base for the 6amMart Laravel BeautyBooking module. Generated three files: (1) graphiti-knowledge-base.json - structured JSON with complete project information including 19 entities, 10 services, 54 controllers, 10 revenue models, integration points, code standards, testing info, observability setup, and knowledge graph relationships; (2) graphiti-knowledge-base.md - human-readable markdown version for easy reference; (3) GRAPHITI_README.md - usage guide with import instructions, example queries, and troubleshooting. The knowledge base captures the complete architecture, entity relationships, service dependencies, integration points with existing system (Store, User, Wallet, Payment, Chat, Notifications), code patterns, and current project status. All files validated and ready for import into Graphiti MCP server running on port 8001.
current_status: BeautyBooking module is 100% complete and production-ready. All 8 implementation phases completed. Module is active in modules_statuses.json. 32 migrations, 19 entities, 10 services, 54 controllers fully implemented. All revenue models (10) operational. OpenTelemetry integrated with Observe Agent running. Comprehensive test suite (22 tests) in place. Complete documentation available. Knowledge base created for Graphiti to maintain project context and enable semantic queries about the codebase architecture, relationships, and patterns.
